ruleRound: During the first round after gaining a status, the Players take turns saying one word related to the location. After that, the participants ask each other questions to identify the spy.
ruleWhenGameEnds: The game ends when the timer expires, all spies are identified, or the spy learned the name of the location and spoke it out loud.
ruleYourGame: In 'Your location' mode, the player who wrote the location automatically gets the 'Resident' status.
ruleOverview: In each round, the players find themselves in some location, each has its own status. Some of the participants turn out to be a spy who does not know where he is. His task is to make other players talk, determine the location and prevent them from being exposed. Each non-spy, in turn, is trying to make it clear to his own people that he knows where he is and therefore is not a spy.
ruleSpyGoal: The goal of a spy is not to reveal himself until the end of the round, or to determine the location everyone is in.
ruleResidentGaal: Resident's goal is to unanimously identify at least one spy and therefore expose him.
timerControl:
Tap to pause
Double tap to resume
title: Wellcome
